name: realtime-avatar-stack-tanstack
title: Realtime Avatar Stack (TanStack Start)
description: Display a stack of avatars showing users currently present in a room. Updates in realtime as users join and leave. Includes full Convex backend with presence tracking.
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env` file as `VITE_CONVEX_URL`.

3. The Convex schema and functions will be automatically deployed when you run `npx convex dev`.
